short_summary: Reconstruction de la cassette et de la rame de mise à l'eau à St. Bernard
description: Les travaux nécessaires pour cette réparation incluent des activités de construction
full_summary:
===============

**Launchway and Slipway Reconstruction at St. Bernard's, NL**
----------------------------------------------------------

*   **Tender Title:** Launchway and Slipway Reconstruction at St. Bernard's, NL
*   **Reference Number:** cb-6835-42889787

**Project Overview**

Fisheries and Oceans Canada invites qualified contractors to submit proposals for the reconstruction of the launchway and slipway at St. Bernard's, Newfoundland and Labrador. The scope of work includes all construction activities necessary for the reconstruction of the facilities.

**Procurement Details**

*   **Amendment Number:** 2
*   **Solicitation Number:** 30004540
*   **Publication Date:** 2023-06-30
*   **Tender Closing Date:** 2023-07-18T14:00:00
*   **Procurement Category:** Construction Services (CNST)
*   **Trade Agreements:** Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
*   **Regions of Opportunity:** Newfoundland and Labrador
*   **Regions of Delivery:** Newfoundland and Labrador

**Tender Requirements**

*   **Selection Criteria:** Lowest Price
*   **Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open Bidding
*   **Notice Type:** Invitation to Qualify

**Contracting Entity Information**

*   **Contracting Entity Name:** Fisheries and Oceans Canada
*   **Contracting Entity Address:**
    200 Kent St, Ottawa, Ontario, K1A0E6
*   **Contractor Contact Information:**
    Carina Della Valle
    Email: <carina.dellavalle@dfo-mpo.gc.ca>
    Phone: 343-542-9691

**Attachments and Documents**

*   Access the tender notice, addendum, and request for qualification documents at the following links:  
    https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender\_notice/6835/30004540-addendum-001.pdf  
    https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender\_notice/6835/30004540-request-for-qualification---en.pdf  

**Disclaimer**

Please note that this tender announcement has expired.
